fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Scout (Day): Learn if your target was visited by any conversion capable faction last night. You will learn which faction visited them, or all if multiple did.
-Listen In (Day): Select a conversion capable faction, you will hear their messages. Messages that refer to a player by name will have the name censored, regardless of who is being referred to. 1 use only.
-Examine (Night): Check a player to see if they are a member of a conversion capable faction. You will learn which faction and *will* bypass Detection Immunity.
-Retaliate (Night): If you or your target is converted, block the conversion and attack the converter. You may prevent multiple conversions, but will not attack other non-converting roles, including killing roles. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
"Conversion capable faction" refers to those factions which fit the definition which was previously given.
You *are* able to be converted, unless using Retaliate.
If all conversion roles and factions are completely eradicated, you will turn into a random Town Power role. Standard reroll rules apply, however the amount of rerolls you had at the beginning of the game will transfer over.
If you spawn without a conversion capable faction in the game, immediately become a new Town Power role.
